name: Mike Zhen
description: Hello! My name is Mike and I am a software engineer with full-stack experience primarily using Javascript and Golang. I am also well-versed in Amazon Web Services (AWS) cloud solutions. I am always trying to stay updated and learning new technologies. (Fun fact: I'm utilizing the creation of this page to learn React!)

experiences.roleDescription: Wrote Golang service to collect and aggregate data from across the enterprise for dashboards to enable quick decision-making from leadership. Containerized services using Docker and automated deployment onto AWS ECS cluster. Streamlined application cross-region failover in AWS.

Coded solution for data encryption in AWS. Automated infrastructure provisioning and server configuration for various applications. Designed architecture for multiple application migrations into the cloud. Led proof-of-concept efforts to validate plausibility of cloud solutions.

Developed web application as internal tool using MEAN technologies from scratch. Wrote REST API's on Express framework and designed front-end using AngularJS. Led effort to automate application deployment into the cloud.

Completed many courses relating to hardware design and low level programming. Gained experience through various projects including: building a terminal-based operating system and programming embedded system to autonomously balance a ball.
